Drinks.name: Mixed Juice
Drinks.description: Any combination that doesn't match a recipe

Drinks.name: Fluffy Sweet Potatoes
Drinks.description: These perfectly ripe potatoes don't rely on honey to deliver a sweet kick.

Drinks.name: Steadfast Ginger Cookies
Drinks.description: These cookies give you the power to tackle hardships without crumbling.

Drinks.name: Fancy Apple Juice
Drinks.description: A rich juice containing only the very best apples.

Drinks.name: Ember Ginger Tea
Drinks.description: Apples have been added to the spicy ginger, helping the tea go down easily.

Drinks.name: Jigglypuff's Fruity Flan
Drinks.description: A very special flan that's as springy as a balloon.

Drinks.name: Lovely Kiss Smoothie
Drinks.description: A relaxing drink that soothes your weariness and envelops you in sleep.

Drinks.name: Lucky Chant Apple Pie
Drinks.description: The chunky pieces of apple in this pie are lucky finds!

Drinks.name: Neroli's Restorative Tea
Drinks.description: A special restorative tea made by Professor Neroli.

Drinks.name: Sweet Scent Chocolate Cake
Drinks.description: Neither people nor Pok√©mon can resist the lure of this cake's sweet aroma.

Drinks.name: Warm Moomoo Milk
Drinks.description: Moomoo Milk that has been heated to further draw out its sweetness.

Drinks.name: Cloud Nine Soy Cake
Drinks.description: A soy cake with a nice, light texture.

Drinks.name: Hustle Protein Smoothie
Drinks.description: A glass of this sweet smoothie goes down a treat after a training session.

Drinks.name: Stalwart Vegetable Juice
Drinks.description: An easy-to-make juice with natural sweet and sour flavors.

Drinks.name: Big Malasada
Drinks.description: A special fried bread made using a recipe from the Alola region.

Drinks.name: Huge Power Soy Donuts
Drinks.description: Soy donuts fried to crisp perfection. They're bodybuilders' friends.

Curries and Stews.name: Fancy Apple Curry
Curries and Stews.description: A simple curry that lets the natural sweetness of it's apples shine.

Curries and Stews.name: Solar Powered Tomato Curry
Curries and Stews.description: A curry made using tomatoes that have turned bright red in the sun.

Curries and Stews.name: Beanburger Curry
Curries and Stews.description: The tender bean patties are the star of the show in this curry.

Curries and Stews.name: Mild Honey Curry
Curries and Stews.description: A mild curry containing plenty of honey. Kids gobble it down!

Curries and Stews.name: Drought Katsu Curry
Curries and Stews.description: The freshly-fried cutlet has a nice sparkle to it.

Curries and Stews.name: Grilled Tail Curry
Curries and Stews.description: The tasty tail elevates the flavor of the curry roux to the next level.

Curries and Stews.name: Dream Eater Butter Curry
Curries and Stews.description: The ingredients in this curry all share a connection to deep sleep.

Curries and Stews.name: Spicy Leek Curry
Curries and Stews.description: The roasted leeks are fragrant and sweet as fruit, perfectly balancing the spicy roux.

Curries and Stews.name: Spore Mushroom Curry
Curries and Stews.Description: A curry that puts you to sleep just as surely as the move Spore.

Curries and Stews.name: Egg Bomb Curry
Curries and Stews.Description: A curry made with oodles of love. Its ingredients are geared toward kids.

Curries and Stews.name: Hearty Cheeseburger Curry
Curries and Stews.Description: This voluminous curry is large enough to astound even a Snorlax.

Curries and Stews.name: Soft Potato Chowder
Curries and Stews.Description: A thick chowder made from potatoes boiled until practically melting.

Curries and Stews.name: Simple Chowder
Curries and Stews.Description: You can really taste the richness of the milk in this simple chowder.

Curries and Stews.name: Ninja Curry
Curries and Stews.Description: This tofu curry is said to have been a favorite dish of ninjas.

Curries and Stews.name: Melty Omelette Curry
Curries and Stews.Description: This curry is topped with a masterfully-cooked omelette that simply melts in the mouth.

Curries and Stews.name: Bulk-Up Bean Curry
Curries and Stews.Description: A hearty curry packed with nutrients needed for bulking up.

Salads.name: Slowpoke Tail Pepper Salad
Salads.description: The mouth-tinglingly spicy pepper highlights the sweetness of the tail.

Salads.name: Spore Mushroom Salad
Salads.description: A salad rich in minerals that improve the quality of sleep.

Salads.name: Snow Cloak Caesar Salad

Salads.name: Gluttony Potato Salad
Salads.description: This potato salad contains just a hint of flavor from the Fancy Apples.

Salads.name: Water Veil Tofu Salad
Salads.description: A salad topped with wobbly cubes of tofu.

Salads.name: Superpower Extreme Salad
Salads.description: A hefty salad that provides all your daily nutrients at once.

Salads.name: Bean Ham Salad
Salads.description: This simple salad features ham made from Bean Sausages.

Salads.name: Snoozy Tomato Salad
Salads.description: The Snoozy Tomatoes in this simple salad are a great aid for sleep.

Salads.name: Moomoo Caprese Salad
Salads.description: A basic salad containing only cheese, tomatoes, and a splash of oil.

Salads.name: Contrary Chocolate Meat Salad
Salads.description: The savory sauce and sweet chocolate sauce let you enjoy a mix of flavors.

Salads.name: Overheat Ginger Salad
Salads.description: This salad's special ginger dressing warms you through and through.

Salads.name: Fancy Apple Salad
Salads.description: A simple salad accentuated by a mashed apple dressing.

Salads.name: Immunity Leek Salad
Salads.description: The crisp leeks in this salad do wonders for the immune system.

Salads.name: Dazzling Apple Cheese Salad
Salads.description: The simple seasoning keeps the focus on the sublime pairing of ingredients.

Salads.name: Ninja Salad
Salads.description: Ninjas cannot resist the flavor of this tofu salad. It's eaten in a flash!
